channel.title: Linux on Doug Van Horn
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Doug Van Horn

item.title: Get Hugo Up and Running
item.description: Here’s a quick reference for getting Hugo installed and running on a local Ubuntu 18.04 box. It also details the installation of the Coder theme and running the server. snap install hugo --channel=extended git submodule add https://github.com/luizdepra/hugo-coder.git themes/hugo-coder hugo server --buildDrafts This information was gleaned from: https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing/#linux https://github.com/luizdepra/hugo-coder/ :wq
